PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-03962025-03-07PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of ANDREW PIPE of Lennox and Addington County, Ontario, as special adviser to the Minister of Sport and Physical Activity, to be known as Special Advisor, to hold office for a term ending on March 31, 2026, on a part-time basis, effective November 9, 2025.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of ANDREW PIPE of Lennox and Addington County, Ontario, as special adviser to the Minister of Sport and Physical Activity, to be known as Special Advisor, to hold office for a term ending on March 31, 2026, on a part-time basis, effective November 9, 2025.
